casebody.data:
Scott KENNEDY, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
MONTCLAIR CENTER CORPORATION BUSINESS IMPROVEMENT DISTRICT, Defendant-Respondent. C-689 September Term 2017
080496 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 14, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005422-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
